value.string:
<tal:block tal:define="baseHrefUrl here/absolute_url;
 cleaninput python: inputvalue;
 cleaninput python: cleaninput.replace('\x27','\x5C\x27');
 cleaninput python: cleaninput.replace('\r','\x5C\x72');
 cleaninput python: cleaninput.replace('\n','\x5C\x6E');
 portal_url here/portal_url;
 server_url request/BASE0;
 portal_path python: portal_url.replace(server_url, '')+'/';
 isInFactory python: test('/portal_factory'in request.URLPATH0, 1, 0);
 isRegisteredFolder python: test(here.Title() and here.isPrincipiaFolderish, 1,0);
 isRegisteredPA python: test(here.Title() and here.meta_type=='PloneArticle', 1,0);
 path_user python: test(isInFactory or isRegisteredFolder or isRegisteredPA,request.URLPATH1,request.URLPATH2);
 cols cols | python: 40;
 rows rows | python: 18;
 editor_width width | python: int(cols * 19.5);
 editor_height height | python: int(rows * 24);
 editor_width python: str(editor_width).replace('px','');
 editor_height python: str(editor_height).replace('px','');
 editor_width python: test('\x25' in editor_width, str(int(int(editor_width.replace('\x25',''))*780/100)), editor_width);
 editor_height python: test('\x25' in editor_height, str(int(int(editor_height.replace('\x25',''))*780/100)), editor_height);">
 <script type="text/javascript" tal:attributes="src string:${portal_url}/fckeditor.js"></script>
 <script type="text/javascript" tal:content="structure string:
 <!--
 var oFCKeditor = new FCKeditor('${inputname}');
 var pathUser = '${path_user}/';
 oFCKeditor.BasePath = '${portal_path}';
 oFCKeditor.Value = '${cleaninput}';
 
 // set the css for editor area
 oFCKeditor.Config['EditorAreaCSS'] = '${portal_path}/erp5_editor.css';
 
 // editor appearance
 oFCKeditor.ToolbarSet = 'ERP5WebZopeCmf';
 oFCKeditor.Width = '100%';
 oFCKeditor.Height = ${editor_height};
 
 // browsing for links
 oFCKeditor.Config['LinkBrowserURL'] = '${portal_path}editor/filemanager/browser/zope/browser.html?Connector=connectors/connectorERP5&ServerPath=/&CurrentPath=' + pathUser ;
 
 // rapid upload activation for links
 //oFCKeditor.Config['LinkUpload'] = true ;
 //oFCKeditor.Config['LinkUploadURL'] = '${portal_path}editor/filemanager/upload/zope/uploadPlone?CurrentPath=' + pathUser ;
 //oFCKeditor.Config['LinkUploadURL'] = '${portal_url}/' + pathUser ;
 
 // browsing for images
 oFCKeditor.Config['ImageBrowserURL'] = '${portal_path}editor/filemanager/browser/zope/browser.html?Type=Image&Connector=connectors/connectorERP5&ServerPath=/&CurrentPath=' + pathUser ;
 
 // rapid upload activation for images
 //oFCKeditor.Config['ImageUpload'] = true ;
 //oFCKeditor.Config['ImageUploadURL'] = '${portal_path}editor/filemanager/upload/zope/uploadPlone?CurrentPath=' + pathUser ;
 
 // browsing for flash
 //oFCKeditor.Config['FlashBrowserURL'] = '${portal_path}editor/filemanager/browser/zope/browser.html?Type=Flash&Connector=connectors/connectorPlone&ServerPath=/&CurrentPath=' + pathUser ;
 
 // rapid upload activation for flash
 //oFCKeditor.Config['FlashUpload'] = true ;
 //oFCKeditor.Config['FlashUploadURL'] = '${portal_path}editor/filemanager/upload/zope/uploadPlone?CurrentPath=' + pathUser ;
 
 oFCKeditor.Create();
 -->"></script>
 </tal:block>
